full_summary:
wellness Plexiglas Install
===============

Title
-----

Installation du bien plexiglas

**Reference Number:** WS4227992606-Doc4228325328

**Amendment Number:** 7

**Solicitation Number:** WS4227992606

**Publication Date:** September 26, 2023

**Tender Closure Date:** October 30, 2023, 2:00 PM

**Amendment Date:** October 30, 2023

**Expected Contract Commencement Date:** October 27, 2023

**Expected Contract Completion Date:** February 2, 2024

**Procurement Notice Status:** CLOSED

Services & Deliverables
----------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites contractors to provide and install 1/8-inch white opaque plexiglas on the perimeter walls of the basement, 1st and 2nd floor elevator lobbies, and the corridor leading to the loading dock at the Sir John A. MacDonald Building, located at 144 Wellington Street.

**Classification:** Building and facility maintenance and repair services, with specialized services in glass and glazing.

Bidding Information
-------------------

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

Contact Information
-----------------

Lisa Hampel (SPAC/PSPC)
lisa.hampel@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
